Portland.Upfor Gallery:
Upfor is an American contemporary art gallery based in Portland, Oregon, United States, presenting primary market artworks by early and mid-career artists.


== History ==
The gallery opened in 2013 in its present location at 929 NW Flanders Street in Portland. In its single exhibition space of 1,700 square feet (160 m2), the gallery mounts eight to ten full-scale exhibitions per year.
